name: Eric Greitens
description:
If Eric Greitens the most unlikely Jewish governor ever?

He is from Missouri... not too many Jews.

He is an ex-Navy Seal... not too many Jews.

He is a Republican... alright, sure, some Jews, but not too many Jews.

He shot a gun for 30 seconds straight in a campaign ad...

Wait, are we sure he is Jewish?

(Editor's update, June 1, 2018: After a scandal-full year, Greitens resigned amidst threads of impeachment.)
